scripts.dev: nodemon --exec "pnpm run build" -e ts,ejs & pnpm run start
scripts.dev:brave: nodemon --exec "pnpm run build && osascript tools/refresh-brave.scpt & pnpm run start" -e ts,ejs
scripts.dev:chrome: nodemon --exec "pnpm run build && osascript tools/refresh-chrome.scpt & pnpm run start" -e ts,ejs
